title: Unveiling Nail Trends with Alabama Barker at the Modelones New Product Launch Event
description: The launch party of Modelones Mini Salon took place on August 24th at the Hollywood Hills Estate, where the luxurious villa, infinity pool, and futuristic architecture provided a breathtaking backdrop of downtown Los Angeles. author: Modelones
excerpt: This event not only showcased Modelones' innovation and quality but also provided participants with a unique experience and inspiration.
text: HomeBeautyThis event not only showcased Modelones' innovation and quality but also provided participants with a unique experience and inspiration.This event not only showcased Modelones' innovation and quality but also provided participants with a unique experience and inspiration.The launch party of Modelones Mini Salon took place on August 24th at the Hollywood Hills Estate, where the luxurious villa, infinity pool, and futuristic architecture provided a breathtaking backdrop of downtown Los Angeles. The event featured a meticulously designed product experience area with live demonstrations by celebrity nail artists, attracting a mix of celebrities, star nail artists, and nail enthusiasts who enjoyed a delightful time together.At this grand event, we also welcomed Alabama Barker. She is not just a musician but also a fashion influencer known for her vibrant style and creative content, engaging large audiences on Instagram and TikTok.The highlight of the Modelones new product launch event was the grand introduction of the Gel Mini Salon, which captured attention with its unique design and user-friendly experience. This revolutionary nail product draws inspiration from nail salons, combining elements of personalized DIY and professional nail trends to offer users an unparalleled experience.The Pure Me series embodies the art of tranquil luxury.The CRYSTAL POWER series introduces users to the mystical energy of crystals.The LOW-KEY PASSION series continues to captivate consumers with its subdued passion and luxurious appeal.During the party, guests engaged in discussions and shared their thoughts on the event and the brand in a friendly and welcoming atmosphere.Scroll to ContinueRecommended ArticlesIn interviews, when asked about impression of Modelones, celebrity nail artist Kim Truong shared, "It makes me feel confident, with bright and vibrant colors." Similarly, celebrity nail artist Angie Shepolished expressed excitement, stating, "Modelones throws amazing parties, and I love any nail brand that isn't afraid to break the norms."When questioned about her favorite among the newly released color series, celebrity Alabama Barker shared, "I love the Pure Me series, pairing white French shapes with pink undertones. That's my favorite combination." Additionally, celebrity nail artist Angie Aguirre expressed her admiration for the LOW-KEY PASSION series, believing that the combination of black and gold is timeless. This event not only showcased Modelones' innovation and quality but also provided participants with a unique experience and inspiration. Modelones' product design and color series align with fashion trends, offering users more choices and enjoyment. We eagerly anticipate further remarkable performances from Modelones in the beauty industry!About ModelonesBased in Los Angeles, Modelones is a world-leading nail art brand with a presence in 30+ countries and a community of over 10 million users. Recognized as the Most Value Brand of the Year on Amazon, we collaborate with major platforms and influencers, including top names like Tom Bachik. Our recent showcase at the Eiffel Tower and media acclaim from Bustle, Glamour, and ELLE underscore our status in the fashion world.Subscribe to Our NewsletterIt's a Nail Art Miracle! Rabbi Launches Hanukkah Nail DecalsLast November we were introduced to the now 26-year-old Rabbi Yael Buechler, who made headlines for her (yeah, we'll make this joke again) unorthodox way of teaching the Torah to her students. In a program called "Midrash Manicures," she has her students come up with nail art to illustrate their understanding of certain stories and teachings. It's been a runaway success at the Jewish day school where she teaches in suburban New York, and she's since expanded: She is now selling Hanukkah-themed nail art decals for those of us who may find drawing a menorah on our pinkie a bit challenging.
html:

  • Beauty

This event not only showcased Modelones' innovation and quality but also provided participants with a unique experience and inspiration.

This event not only showcased Modelones' innovation and quality but also provided participants with a unique experience and inspiration.

The launch party of Modelones Mini Salon took place on August 24th at the Hollywood Hills Estate, where the luxurious villa, infinity pool, and futuristic architecture provided a breathtaking backdrop of downtown Los Angeles. The event featured a meticulously designed product experience area with live demonstrations by celebrity nail artists, attracting a mix of celebrities, star nail artists, and nail enthusiasts who enjoyed a delightful time together.

At this grand event, we also welcomed Alabama Barker. She is not just a musician but also a fashion influencer known for her vibrant style and creative content, engaging large audiences on Instagram and TikTok.

The highlight of the Modelones new product launch event was the grand introduction of the Gel Mini Salon, which captured attention with its unique design and user-friendly experience. This revolutionary nail product draws inspiration from nail salons, combining elements of personalized DIY and professional nail trends to offer users an unparalleled experience.

The Pure Me series embodies the art of tranquil luxury.

The CRYSTAL POWER series introduces users to the mystical energy of crystals.

The LOW-KEY PASSION series continues to captivate consumers with its subdued passion and luxurious appeal.

During the party, guests engaged in discussions and shared their thoughts on the event and the brand in a friendly and welcoming atmosphere.

Scroll to Continue

Recommended Articles

In interviews, when asked about impression of Modelones, celebrity nail artist Kim Truong shared, "It makes me feel confident, with bright and vibrant colors." Similarly, celebrity nail artist Angie Shepolished expressed excitement, stating, "Modelones throws amazing parties, and I love any nail brand that isn't afraid to break the norms."

When questioned about her favorite among the newly released color series, celebrity Alabama Barker shared, "I love the Pure Me series, pairing white French shapes with pink undertones. That's my favorite combination." Additionally, celebrity nail artist Angie Aguirre expressed her admiration for the LOW-KEY PASSION series, believing that the combination of black and gold is timeless.

This event not only showcased Modelones' innovation and quality but also provided participants with a unique experience and inspiration. Modelones' product design and color series align with fashion trends, offering users more choices and enjoyment. We eagerly anticipate further remarkable performances from Modelones in the beauty industry!

About Modelones

Based in Los Angeles, Modelones is a world-leading nail art brand with a presence in 30+ countries and a community of over 10 million users. Recognized as the Most Value Brand of the Year on Amazon, we collaborate with major platforms and influencers, including top names like Tom Bachik. Our recent showcase at the Eiffel Tower and media acclaim from Bustle, Glamour, and ELLE underscore our status in the fashion world.

Subscribe to Our Newsletter

It's a Nail Art Miracle! Rabbi Launches Hanukkah Nail Decals

Last November we were introduced to the now 26-year-old Rabbi Yael Buechler, who made headlines for her (yeah, we'll make this joke again) unorthodox way of teaching the Torah to her students. In a program called "Midrash Manicures," she has her students come up with nail art to illustrate their understanding of certain stories and teachings. It's been a runaway success at the Jewish day school where she teaches in suburban New York, and she's since expanded: She is now selling Hanukkah-themed nail art decals for those of us who may find drawing a menorah on our pinkie a bit challenging.
